entry.def: Applique is the craft of sewing fabric shapes onto larger pieces of cloth. You can also use applique to refer to things you make using this craft.

example.ex: Bead-work, applique and embroidery add a uniquely feminine touch.
example.tran: 珠饰、嵌花和刺绣可增添一种独特的女人味。

means.word_mean: 1. a decorative design made of one material sewn over another
